name: vscode-copilot-confluence-chat-tool
description: An intelligent Confluence integration for VS Code Copilot Chat that provides smart search capabilities, keyword extraction, and context-aware content discovery. Search using natural language, paragraphs, or keywords without needing exact page titles or space keys.

languageModelTools.name: confluence-tool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Intelligently search Confluence based on paragraphs, keywords, or chat context. This tool extracts relevant keywords from natural language content and performs sophisticated searches to find related pages. Use this when the user provides context, paragraphs, or wants to find pages related to their discussion.

content.description: The content, paragraph, keywords, or context to search for related Confluence pages

context.description: Optional additional context from chat history or related information

spaceKey.description: Optional space key to limit search to a specific space

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

includeContent.description: Whether to include page content in results (default: true)

confluenceChatTool.apiToken.description: Your Atlassian API token (create one at https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens)
